name: redux-store-element
description: A custom element allowing a more declarative use of Redux.

scripts.test: npm run link && xvfb-run electron --enable-logging node_modules/scram-engine/main.js --entry-file test/index.html --auto-run
scripts.test-window: npm run link && electron --enable-logging node_modules/scram-engine/main.js --entry-file test/index.html --window
